citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10pm on 1 June
2022. Called responsible person and left a message. Made contact with a facility representative shortly after and they
stated that the responsible person would not be available for several hours due to a personal appointment.
End of report.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10pm on 1 June 
2022. Called responsible person and left a message. Made contact with a facility representative shortly after and they 
stated that the responsible person would not be available for several hours due to a personal appointment. 
End of report. 
 
 
 
End Section
